title: Code Name: K.O.Z.
description: A look at the 17-25 December 2013 corruption scandal in Turkey, from the viewpoint of the Erdogan government.

title: Saving Christmas
description: Kirk is enjoying the annual Christmas party extravaganza thrown by his sister until he realizes he needs to help out Christian, his brother-in-law, who has a bad case of the bah-humbugs. ...

title: Daniel der Zauberer
description: Evil assassins want to kill Daniel Kublbock, the third runner up for the German Idols.

title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

title: Pledge This!
description: At South Beach University, a beautiful sorority president takes in a group of unconventional freshman girls seeking acceptance into her house.
